duties_responsibilities.duty: Support business operations within a business unit or division.
Compose, write, and edit communication materials.
Research and compile information for presentations.
Participate in the preparation of department or project budgets; monitor expenses or accounts.
Represent the business unit through interaction with constituencies outside the unit.
Develop and prepare meeting materials and agendas for one or more executives.
Maintain calendars and prioritize meeting requests.
Handle logistics for meetings and special events.
Organize and archive meeting materials for future reference.
Review and respond to emails and correspondence; refer requests to colleagues, as appropriate.
Serve as a liaison to key stakeholders and business partners; research issues and determine and facilitate appropriate actions to communicate information or resolve concerns, as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Communications or a related field (Master's preferred)
